briefTitle: Taste Disorders and Their Relation to BMI, FFQ, and EORTC QLQ-BR23 in Breast Cancer Patients During Chemotherapy.
officialTitle: Taste Disorders and Their Relation to Body Mass Index, Food Frequency Questionnaire and Quality of Life in Breast Cancer Patients During Chemotherapy.
conditions: Breast Cancer, Taste Disorders, Dysgeusia, Ageusia, Quality of Life
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Prevalence of taste disorders and perception of the four basic flavors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

- Chemotherapy with Doxorubicin + Cyclophosphamide (DC) or Paclitaxel + Carboplatin (PC) or Docetaxel.

Exclusión Criteria:

* No smokers Infections in oral cavity Acute respiratory diseases Gastro- oesophageal reflux disease Other types of cancer.
